name: Intraday Dual VWAP-OBV Momentum Futures
description: Intraday long-only momentum strategy for equity index futures using a VWAP divergence breakout with OBV confirmation. Trades the E-mini S&P 500 (ES) on 5-minute bars, entering when price crosses above session VWAP and OBV’s 20-bar growth exceeds 5 %. Exits when price falls below VWAP, OBV slope turns negative, trailing stop of 0.7 % from peak close, or fixed 1.5 % profit, with risk-capped sizing.
